credit.name: Emmanuel L. C. de los Santos

summary.description: Neural network identification of RiPP precursor peptides | NeuRiPP (Neural Network Identification of RiPP Precursor Peptides) | NeuRiPP is a neural network framework designed for classifying peptide sequences as putative precursor peptide sequences for RiPP biosynthetic gene clusters.
